about_the_game:
Esports History: Prologue is an RPG simulator combining time management, character development, and deep mini-games. You will take the role of an ordinary student and develop him into a professional eSports player. Defeat bosses in tournaments, raise your reputation in the community, and become the best!

TIME-MANAGEMENT


The race with the strongest players never ends. Properly manage your time to train and earn money, but control stress and fatigue to come out of the battle as a winner.

MINI-GAMES


Enjoy alternative versions of hit games of the past. Develop in one of the eSports disciplines: strategies or shooters.
Training skills, upgrading your skill tree and mental state affect your character's strength in mini-games.

CREATE A UNIQUE CHARACTER


Form your own play style. Upgrade your characteristics and talents as you wish.
Will you train AIM to improve marksmanship or Strafe to become elusive?
Develop an economy by dominating resources or micro-control to emerge victorious? It's up to you.

name: Esports History: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up.
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up.
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Esports History: Prologue is a free RPG simulator about the era of the birth of eSports. Start from scratch and work your way up to an eSports career. Use your resources and time wisely to develop a unique character and win tournaments.
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian
